author: Home Repair Tutor
description: DITRA Peel and Stick installation tips…I prime the plywood with PRIMER-PS. Then I cut all mats to size. I pull the plastic off and bond the mat to the floor and against adjacent sheets. The most important step is to activate the pressure-sensitive adhesive with a float. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this video and continuing to make great products for tile floors 👍🏽🔥#ditra #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #tilefloor #sponsored
title: DITRA Peel and Stick Installation Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
